description: Identifier of the parent asset information record this item belongs to; likely a foreign key used to group related items. Confirm with SME.
System-generated date/time when the record was created or last updated, in yyyymmddHHMMSSmmm format.
Identifier of the asset type this item applies to; likely a foreign key to the asset type catalog. Confirm with SME.
Indicates the reference context for assettype (e.g., which code set or table it uses); likely metadata rather than a business value. Confirm with SME.
Short, human-readable description of the asset capability or attribute defined by this item.
Optional free-text notes or remarks about the item.
Unique identifier for this item record; likely the primary key.
Boolean flag indicating whether the item is inactive or not in use.
Identifier from a legacy system for migration or integration mapping.
Name of the source table in the legacy system for lineage and mapping.
